Detailed Description

Provides cursor positioning, scrolling and text selection functionality in a TextView.

Definition at line 25 of file MovementMethod.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::text::MovementMethod::canSelectArbitrarily ( ) [pure virtual]

Returns true if this movement method allows arbitrary selection of any text; false if it has no selection (like a movement method that only scrolls) or a constrained selection (for example limited to links.

The "Select All" menu item is disabled if arbitrary selection is not allowed.

Implemented in gaia::text::ArrowKeyMovementMethod, and gaia::text::ScrollingMovementMethod.

virtual bool gaia::text::MovementMethod::onKeyOther ( const ui::TextWidget *  view,
const Spannable *  text,
const core::KeyEvent &  event 
) [pure virtual]

If the key listener wants to other kinds of key events, return true, otherwise return false and the caller (i.e.

the widget host) will handle the key.

Implemented in gaia::text::ArrowKeyMovementMethod, and gaia::text::ScrollingMovementMethod.
